document_data.mainbody:
racker Dullwill was a cultist of the Absolute who served his goddess during the late 15 century DR.
He carried a crudely-crafted bow.
In the , cutlists from the Shattered Sanctum launched a vicious raid on the Waukeens Rest inn, taking several captives and killing many more. The goblinoid cultists returned tot he Sanctum to celebrate their victory with a great feast and many kegs of ale. Dullwill was among the goblins who got exceptionally drunk, and passed out across the exterior of the temples courtyard.
